mapper.sql: SELECT contents.content_id, contents.content_sum, contents.content_name, contents.target, contents.category, contents.start_day, contents.end_day, contents.likes, contents.is_accepted FROM contents
mapper.update: UPDATE contents SET content_sum = #{contentSum}, content_name =#{contentName}, category =#{category}, start_day =#{startDay}, end_day =#{endDay}, target =#{target}, likes =#{likes}, is_accepted = 0 WHERE writer_id = #{writerId} AND content_id = #{contentId}

UPDATE funding_contents SET detail = #{detail}, transaction = #{transaction}, production_cost = #{productionCost}, purpose= #{purpose}, min_invest = #{minInvest}
WHERE content_id = #{contentId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.content_id, c.content_sum, c.content_name, c.target, c.category, c.start_day, c.end_day, c.likes, c.is_accepted, c.writer_id, i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_name FROM contents c JOIN image i ON(c.content_id = i.content_id) WHERE c.is_accepted = 1 ORDER BY c.end_day DESC

SELECT c.content_id, c.content_name, c.target, c.category, c.start_day, c.end_day, c.likes, c.is_accepted, c.writer_id, c.content_sum, s.sc_id, s.detail, s.team_detail, s.plan_detail,g.gift_id, g.criterion, g.gift_list, g.ticket_cnt , i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_name FROM contents c JOIN support_contents s ON(c.content_id = s.content_id) join gift g on (g.content_id = s.content_id) JOIN image i ON(c.content_id = i.content_id) WHERE s.content_id =#{VALUE}

SELECT c.content_id, c.content_name, c.target, c.category, c.start_day, c.end_day, c.likes, c.is_accepted,c.writer_id, c.content_sum, f.funding_id , f.detail , f.transaction , f.production_cost, f.purpose , f.min_invest , g.gift_id, g.criterion, g.gift_list, g.ticket_cnt , i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_name FROM contents c JOIN funding_contents f ON (f.content_id = c.content_id) join gift g on (g.content_id = f.content_id) JOIN image i ON(c.content_id = i.content_id) WHERE f.content_id =#{VALUE}

SELECT contents.content_id, contents.content_sum, contents.content_name, contents.target, contents.category, contents.start_day, contents.end_day, contents.likes, contents.is_accepted FROM contents JOIN writer ON contents.writer_id = writer.writer_id JOIN user_info ON writer.info_id = user_info.info_id WHERE user_info.name = #{VALUE}

SELECT contents.content_id, contents.content_sum, contents.content_name, contents.target, contents.category, contents.start_day, contents.end_day, contents.likes, contents.is_accepted ,i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_name FROM contents JOIN writer ON contents.writer_id = writer.writer_id JOIN image i ON(contents.content_id = i.content_id) WHERE writer.writer_id = #{VALUE}

SELECT c.content_id, c.content_sum, c.content_name as contentName, c.target, c.category, c.start_day, c.end_day, c.likes, c.is_accepted, c.writer_id, i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_name FROM contents c JOIN image i ON(c.content_id = i.content_id) WHERE c.is_accepted = 0
SELECT CASE WHEN NOT EXISTS ( SELECT funding_id FROM funding_contents WHERE content_id = #{VALUE} ) THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS content_identity FROM dual

SELECT c.content_id, c.content_sum, c.content_name, c.target, c.category, c.start_day, c.end_day, c.likes, c.is_accepted, c.writer_id,i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_name FROM ( SELECT content_id, content_sum,content_name,target ,category,start_day,end_day ,likes,is_accepted, writer_id, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY likes DESC) rank_likes FROM contents ) c JOIN image i ON(c.content_id = i.content_id) WHERE c.rank_likes <=6

SELECT c.content_id, c.content_sum, c.content_name, c.target, c.category, c.start_day, c.end_day, c.likes, c.is_accepted, c.writer_id,i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_name FROM ( SELECT content_id, content_sum,content_name,target ,category,start_day,end_day ,likes,is_accepted, writer_id, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY content_sum DESC) rank_content_sum FROM contents ) c JOIN image i ON(c.content_id = i.content_id) WHERE c.rank_content_sum <= 20 ORDER BY c.rank_content_sum

SELECT c.content_id, c.content_sum, c.content_name, c.target, c.category, c.start_day, c.end_day, c.likes, c.is_accepted, c.writer_id, i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_name FROM contents c JOIN image i ON(c.content_id = i.content_id) WHERE c.content_id in(select content_id from support_contents) AND c.is_accepted = 1 ORDER BY c.end_day DESC

SELECT c.content_id, c.content_sum, c.content_name, c.target, c.category, c.start_day, c.end_day, c.likes, c.is_accepted, c.writer_id, i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_name FROM contents c JOIN image i ON(c.content_id = i.content_id) WHERE c.content_id in(select content_id from funding_contents) AND c.is_accepted = 1 ORDER BY c.end_day DESC
